Name: Snowball!
About the game: Ever wonder what ULTIMATE KID POWER is truly capable of? Experience a homemade and hand-cranked winter pinball adventure, sending your behemoth snow spheres through a bobsled maze of snowbanks, homemade wooden paddles, Tesla coils, igloos, railcars and more... .. . ... . . .. .... . . - Detailed 16-bit styled pixel art. - A more 'discovery-based' approach to pinball. Learn the secret rules of the board to access hard to reach places and rack up HUGE SCORE BONUSES, which are generally agreed to be more important than any other current event in the real world. - A laid back, holiday-inspired soundtrack.. . . . ..chilled-out piano and chip tune jazz.. . .
